word: Elevated, Refined, Conscientious Manner.-- Throughout the ages, God has been particular as to the design and the accomplishment of His work. In this age, He has given His people much light and instruction in regard to how His work is to be carried forward--in an elevated, refined, conscientious manner; and He is pleased with those who in their service carry out His design.--Review and Herald, Sept. 14, 1905.
